author: Reuters
title: World stocks rise for second day on signs of progress against the coronavirus
description: 'A day does not a trend make, a week does not a trend make... but we think the market is bottoming out'
content:
LONDON — World stock markets enjoyed a second day of sharp gains on Tuesday as signs of progress against the coronavirus in both Europe and the United States and more liberal helpings of stimulus kept investors charging back in.
